apps.name: WinSCP
apps.description: Free SFTP, SCP, S3 and FTP client for Windows
apps.install_notes: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: During installation, select "Install for all users" option. Do NOT select "Install for me only" or the application will fail to run.

apps.name: PuTTY
apps.description: Free SSH and Telnet client for Windows
apps.install_notes: ✅ Works perfectly out of the box - no special configuration needed.
